snippet.title: GYLT | Multiplatform announcement trailer
snippet.description:
💫Wishlist now on STEAM 🎮 https://store.steampowered.com/app/2206210/GYLT/?l=spanish

Shape the fears... Fear the shapes.
Set in a creepy and melancholic world, GYLT is an eerie story mixing fantasy and reality in a surrealist place where your nightmares become reality. Hide from terrible creatures or confront them as you find your way through the challenges of this wicked world.

GYLT will be available on July 6th on Steam, PlayStation 5, PlayStation 4, Xbox Series and Xbox One.
